java.lang.String.value: void connector, replace or don't use it
Use this sequence to fill a PDF form.
The pdf file containing the form. This file must be installed in a 'pdf_template' directory created at the root of a Convertigo project workspace
The target PDF file name. A PDF fille will be created with this file name with the form filled
A JSON data string representing an Array of {key:value} objects. Each key has to be the name of a PDF from field and will be filled with the corresponding value
Use this sequence to get all fields declared in a PDF form
The pdf file containing the form. This file must be installed in a 'pdf_template' directory created at the root of a Convertigo project workspace
